page.title: 20*House Renovation continued*
page.content:
We built a new roof and put in some insulation and built a new chimney. We had a new fire place put in and when we completed the house we pebble dashed it. My mum decorated the house and nana helped her. In 1985 we bought the house on the other side of our original house. This house has five rooms altogether. We have started on the garden which is going to be a vegetable patch. So three houses have become only one house for our family of six.
Now Dad has demolished the pig sty at the bottom of the Quaker house and is landscaping the garden. The whole lot is now called Holly Cottage.
Written by Rebecca Simpson aged 10 yrs
